param.name: beam-timer
param.desc: Time for which decode session lasts before timing out

discrete.name: SECURITY_REDUNDANCY_AND_LENGTH
discrete.desc: Very aggressive but higher misdecode rate

discrete.name: SECURITY_SHORT_OR_CODABAR
discrete.desc: Aggressive

discrete.name: SECURITY_ALL_TWICE
discrete.desc: Moderate

discrete.name: SECURITY_LONG_AND_SHORT
discrete.desc: Not aggressive

discrete.name: SECURITY_ALL_THRICE
discrete.desc: Use with very poor barcodes

discrete.name: Disabled
discrete.desc: Disable picklist

discrete.name: Hardware reticle
discrete.desc: Decode barcode under hardware reticle

discrete.name: Centered
discrete.desc: Decodes the barcode which is in the center of the image

discrete.name: Disable
discrete.desc: Inverse disabled

discrete.name: Enable
discrete.desc: Inverse enabled

discrete.name: Auto
discrete.desc: Inverse auto

param.name: upcean-supplemental-mode
param.desc: Set how supplementals should be handled

discrete.name: Security level 0
discrete.desc: This setting allows the digital scanner to operate in its most aggressive state, while providing sufficient security in decoding most in-spec bar codes

discrete.name: Security level 1
discrete.desc: This default setting eliminates most misdecodes

discrete.name: Security level 2
discrete.desc: Select this option if Security level 1 fails to eliminate misdecodes

discrete.name: Security level 3
discrete.desc: If you selected Security Level 2 and misdecodes still occur, select this security level

param.name: decoder-code128-enable-subtypes
param.desc: Enable other sub types besides EAN 128 and ISBT 128

discrete.name: Security level 0
discrete.desc: This setting allows the digital scanner to operate in its most aggressive state, while providing sufficient security in decoding most in-spec bar codes

discrete.name: Security level 1
discrete.desc: This default setting eliminates most misdecodes

discrete.name: Security level 2
discrete.desc: Select this option if Security level 1 fails to eliminate misdecodes

discrete.name: Security level 3
discrete.desc: If you selected Security Level 2 and misdecodes still occur, select this security level

discrete.name: CODE_ID_TYPE_NONE
discrete.desc: No code id

discrete.name: CODE_ID_TYPE_AIM
discrete.desc: AIM code id

discrete.name: CODE_ID_TYPE_SYMBOL
discrete.desc: Symbol Technologies code identifier appended to the decode data

param.name: view-finder-mode

discrete.name: Viewfinder disabled
discrete.desc: A viewfinder is not displayed during scanning

discrete.name: Viewfinder enabled
discrete.desc: Viewfinder displayed to aid decoding

discrete.name: Static reticle
discrete.desc: A reticle is drawn in the centre of the screen (this aids in scanning especially when picklist is enabled)

param.desc: Describes whether a viewfinder should be displayed and if a reticle drawn to aid with scanning

param.name: view-finder-feedback-mode

discrete.name: Viewfinder feedback disabled
discrete.desc: This mode disables any visual feedback on a successful decode

discrete.name: Viewfinder feedback enabled
discrete.desc: This mode displays the last image that successfully decoded. The duration for which the image is displayed can be set by the VF Feedback Time

param.desc: This parameter allows selection of the different feedback parameters on a successful decode

param.name: view-finder-feedback-time
param.desc: This parameter allows selection of the different feedback parameters on a successful decode
